Rich - 

That "melted" look to the plate kind of goes with the Saotome call, but notice the tekkogani at the top of the nakago-ana. That "old man's moustache" form makes me think more Tosa Myochin work. Strange the papers do not say something more positive about this, or if they do, I can't read it. (Always liked the "kiku" form of tsuba.)

Ron
